entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High plus 1.
